404.title: Whoopsidaises! Something's not quite right here. Be a dear and try again in a bit? If you are searching for a product, its probably SOLD OUT!

help.if_using_unsupported_browser_html: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

comments.form_error: Whoopsidaisies! Something's not quite right here. Be a dear, correct the following and submit again:
comments.name: Name
comments.success_moderated: Thank you for your thoughts! Your post will need to be approved by Team Chiaroscuro, but we promise it will be published very soon.
comments.success: Yippittiee Boo!! Successfully posted your comment.

general.title: My Bag Of Goodies
general.empty: There's nothing in your bag as yet. Fill it up fast before all our beauties go home with someone else! No pressure, we promise. :)

general.no_products_in_store: We are totally and completely sold out!! The Workshop is busy making beautiful new pieces and they will be up for sale soon. Check back again in a day or two. Thank you for your love!
general.no_matches: Sorry, we currently have no products that match your search. But you can send us a suggestion on feedback@chiaroscuro.in. We are always listening!
general.no_products_in_collection: We are all sold out here!! The Workshop is busy making beautiful new pieces and they will be up for sale soon. Check back again in a day or two. Thank you for your love!
general.no_collections: We are totally and completely sold out!! The Workshop is busy making beautiful new pieces and they will be up for sale soon. Check back again in a day or two. Thank you for your love!

form.name: Name
form.message_placeholder: Type Out Your Love, Thoughts or Magical Ideas for Chiaroscuro here.
form.error: Whoopsidaisies! Something's not quite right here. Be a dear, correct the following and submit again:
form.post_success: Thank you for getting in touch with us. We promise to get back to you very, very soon.

activate_account.title: Activate Account
activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

addresses.title: Manage Account Addresses
addresses.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this address?

orders.no_orders: You haven't bought anything from us as yet!

recover_password.title: Retrieve your password
recover_password.subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Please enter a new password for {{ email }}

empty.no_products_in_store: We are totally and completely sold out!! The Workshop is busy making beautiful new pieces and they will be up for sale soon. Check back again in a day or two. Thank you for your love!
empty.add_product_html: Please add a product to your {{ collection_title }} collection.
empty.no_content_html: To add content to your homepage, visit your theme settings page.

product.sold_out: SOLD OUT! (Fret not. We can make-to-order too! Mail us on sales@chiaroscuro.in and we'll make it happen)
product.product_is_sold_out: SOLD OUT! (Fret not. We can make-to-order too! Mail us on sales@chiaroscuro.in and we'll make it happen)
product.unavailable: SOLD OUT! (Fret not. We can make-to-order too! Mail us on sales@chiaroscuro.in and we'll make it happen)

issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

customer_account.save_my_information_label: Save my information for a faster checkout

stock.items_unavailable_notice: Some of the items in your goody bag were sold during your checkout process.
stock.go_back_to_cart_button_label: Go back to my goody bag

shipping.waiting_on_rate_notice: Hang on while we check the exact shipping rates...
shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: We currently dont ship to your destination but you can write to us on sales@chiaroscuro.in with your chosen items and we can work something out.
shipping.no_rates_for_country_notice: We currently dont ship to {{country}} but you can write to us on sales@chiaroscuro.in with your chosen items and we can work something out.
